exclusion.criterion: Use of any tobacco product within 30 days prior to first dose of study drug
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Use of any prescription or non-prescription drugs or dietary supplements within 7 days
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Insulin or hypoglycemic drugs within 3 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Drugs that may affect GH and IGF-1 levels (e.g., alpha-adrenergic, beta-adrenergic, and cholinergic drugs) within 1 month prior to dosing
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a known case of Acromegaly who underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He takes only vitamin D and multivitamins after his surgery.
